greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest prime that is the sum of four nonzero squares in exactly n ways.
link: Index entries for sequences related to sums of squares
mathematica: lst = {}; Do[p = 2; While[True, If[PrimeQ[p] && Length@Select[PowersRepresentations[p, 4, 2], ! MemberQ[#, 0] &] == n, AppendTo[lst, p]; Break[]]; p++], {n, 0, 49}]; lst
results.author: _Arkadiusz Wesolowski_, Nov 02 2012
